column5: Does anyone know of a message board or web site regarding fishing in Alberta or the other western Provinces. Thanks, Scotto

www.outdoormessageboard.com/ should take you to a host that has a fishing alberta message board. www.looneybeaver.com/forum/ has a manitoba board, with a small western canada section also. A strictly manitoba board is http://members3.boardhost.com/fishmanitoba/ From the manitoba sites there should be links in some posts to an extreme fishing site for northern manitoba that a "northern manitoban" has set up fairly recently. Good info on the manitoba sites, with only a few annoying personalities, that are easily ignored. Hope this helps
Here are a few boards for western Canada.http://members.boardhost.com/fishalberta/http://www.gowalleye.com/http://www.fishalberta.com/http://flyfishingwest.proboards25.com/ Hope these help.
